name: ADR-02 Searcher
effect: You can include up to 50 copies of cards with this card's card number in your deck.When you would play this card from your hand, reduce its play cost by 2 if you don't have another [ADR-02 Searcher] in play.[Your Turn] This Digimon can't attack players.[On Play]＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] All of your Digimon with [D-Reaper] in their traits get +1000 DP.
